ai.summary: A quick 0.7 km easy walk starting near Belvedere Station in the UK. This short, family-friendly route is ideal for a casual urban stroll with flat terrain and light scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily paved sidewalks with a level profile. Expect urban surroundings and occasional curb crossings; surfaces may vary at edge paths but remain generally flat and easy.
ai.safety_notes: Stay aware of pedestrians and street crossings. Keep to sidewalks and marked crossings; dress for the weather; bring a light waterproof layer and a fully charged phone; daylight hours vary by season.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and summer; may be breezy or chilly in autumn/winter.
